# Third-Party Software Licenses

This file lists all third-party software included in or used by CMAudio.

## Maximilian

**Location:** `third_party/Maximilian/`

**License:** MIT License

**Copyright:** Copyright Â© 2009 Mick Grierson

**License Text:** See [third_party/Maximilian/LICENSE.txt](Maximilian/LICENSE.txt)

**Description:** Maximilian is a cross-platform audio synthesis and signal processing library providing oscillators, filters, envelopes, and audio effects.

**Upstream Repository:** https://github.com/micknoise/Maximilian

**Usage in CMAudio:** Integrated as a git submodule with a C ABI wrapper for audio synthesis capabilities. Optional component controlled by WITH_MAXIMILIAN CMake option.
